alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM, BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 828 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rincon to Keller, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Hilton Head Island, Pooler, Bluffton, Beaufort, Port Royal, Richmond Hill, Tybee Island, and Bellinger Hill Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham
